message.deleteOrNot: Are you sure you want to delete?
message.resetOrNot: Are you sure you want to reset?
message.deltaHint: Time Delta = The difference between your slowest time and the time set for the course. The farther below zero, the better the time.
message.remark1: This is only a rough guide, for reference purposes only. Some things remain unimplemented and data may be incorrect.
message.remark2: The gray background shows kakari. The light purple background shows corners.
message.remark3: Saved data may become unusable at any time as changes are made. Please recreate it every time until the data is stabilized.
message.remark4: Functionality related to other umas, like position keeping, are not yet implemented.
message.remark5: Skills related to other umas are implemented in an approximately appropriate way.
message.remark6: The opponent's debuff skills have a flat activation rate of 80%.
message.remark7: Aptitude doesn't directly modify the uma's stats, and so isn't reflected in the corrected status.
message.remark8: Created by: 砂井裏鍵. Various other sources helped greatly.
